description: Wiltshire Police, who were in attendance, say all closures have now been lifted.
title: A30 traffic: Major A-road reopens after Salisbury crash
title_page: A30 traffic: Major A-road reopens after Salisbury crash - BBC News
maintext:
A major A-road in Salisbury has reopened following a crash, police say.
The A30 was shut between St Thomas' Bridge Roundabout and Winterslow Road, Wiltshire Police said.
Drivers were urged to avoid the area and follow the diversion route along the A338.
Witnesses or anyone with dashcam footage should contact police.
